title: BiLumix Headlamp 1.5x Loupe
text:
We need to know your IPD (Interpupillary Distance). You can check your IPD by yourself.

Headlamp Loupe Specification

  • Magnification: 1.5x
  • Working distance: 5~100cm 
  • Working field size: 45cm
  • Weight: 13g

Compatibility

  • Generation 1.0
  • Generation 2.0

title: Surgical Loupe 2.5x
text:
We need to know your IPD (Interpupillary Distance). You can check your IPD by yourself.

 Headlamp Loupe Specification

  • Magnification: 2.5x
  • Working distance: 20 ~ 100cm (Adjustable) 
  • Weight: 19g

Compatibility

  • Generation 1.0
  • Generation 2.0

title: BiLumix 3.5x Loupe
text:
While 3.5x loupe can be calibrated by user, we will setup the initial calibration according to your IPD (Interpupillary Distance). You can check your IPD by yourself.

Loupe Specification

  • Magnification: 3.5x
  • Working Distance: Adjustable (20 ~ 60cm)
  • Weight: 69g

Features

  • Adjustable Working Distance
  • Adjustable Pupil Distance (User Friendly)
